"Out of the way!": "...Stay down, please!"
"Hah... Hah...!"
"The enemy readings have disappeared... Elmir doesn't seem to be nearby."
"Then we have no reason to be here... We're going to crush the Emperor right away."
"Eh! Shouldn't you hold a vigil for them..."
"We don't have time for something that meaningless... Dammit...!"
"G-Gettemhart!?"
"Don't push yourself."
"Why don't we take a break?"
"Ha, don't make me laugh. That's the same as telling me to die."
"Ha, don't make me laugh. Does it look like we'd get better by taking a break?"
"Our bodies are already at their limits due to the experimental soldier project. We don't have the luxury of stopping."
"But, if you keep going at this rate..."
"That's alright. That's how our lives are, it's fine."
"It's not about how much left we have to live, but how we choose to live it."
"I won't end up like the guys we just beat...! With these hands, I'll crush the Emperor."
"While I appreciate that you care about our wellbeing... I share the same view as Gettemhart."
"And so, even if we did hold a memorial... in their current state, we don't know who they are. And I don't want to remember them like this..."
"Both of them are awfully angry... Even I can sense that."
"Such cruelty must never be tolerated. We must absolutely put an end to this..."
